lead_paragraph: The Red Wings’ Johan Franzen was expected to miss Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals against Pittsburgh on Saturday, but Coach Mike Babcock said Franzen would return during the series. Franzen leads the N.H.L. with 12 playoff goals despite missing the last five games of the Western Conference finals against Dallas with concussion-like symptoms.
